pages.text: Aspect gems are important for crafting various themed scepters as you progress on an upgrade path. They are created by interacting with the environment in various ways.$(br2)$(bold)For any aspect gem to be created, a Gem of Promise needs to be held in the off-hand$()

A blazing gem has a heart of fire.$(br2)Create one by holding a Gem of Promise in your off-hand and withstanding a large amount of fire-type damage.$(br2)Orb Modifier: $(l:amethyst_imbuement:modifiers/inner_fire)Inner Fire$().

A sparking gem is brimming with lightning energy.$(br2)Create one by holding a Gem of Promise in your off-hand and getting struck by lightning.$(br2)Orb Modifier: $(l:amethyst_imbuement:modifiers/dynamo)Dynamo$()

A brutal gem is tough, with a steely resolve.$(br2)Create one by holding a Gem of Promise in your off-hand and taking damage from hostile mobs.$(br2)Orb Modifier: $(l:amethyst_imbuement:modifiers/blessed)Blessed$()
A lethal gem bleeds the essence of combat.$(br2)Create one by holding a Gem of Promise in your off-hand and killing mobs.$(br2)Orb Modifier: $(l:amethyst_imbuement:modifiers/dangerous)Dangerous$()

A inquisitive gem has a curious mind.$(br2)Create one by holding a Gem of Promise in your off-hand and subjecting yourself to many status effects.$(br2)Orb Modifier: $(l:amethyst_imbuement:modifiers/masterful)Masterful$()

A healers gem glows with life.$(br2)Create one by holding a Gem of Promise in your off-hand and healing yourself (a lot). Eating counts.$(br2)Orb Modifier: $(l:amethyst_imbuement:modifiers/saints_grace)Saints Grace$()

A mystical gem flickers with raw magic.$(br2)Create one by holding a Gem of Promise in your off-hand and casting spells with a scepter or scroll.$(br2)Orb Modifier: $(l:amethyst_imbuement:modifiers/savant_aspect)Savant Aspect$()
